text: Dr. Isaac Ng and his team of nurses are friendly and helpful. They took the time to explain my medication clearly, ensuring I understood everything. I also got my flu vaccine during my visit. The service was excellent, and the pricing was affordable. Highly recommended!

It is a great experience with Dr Isaac Ng Ker Wei, suddenly having an eye allergy. So bad.
Thanks for the friendly front counter staff too, especially the Indian lady who speaks Mandarin, even I speak English, but she still choose to speak the language I feel more comfortable of.

Very thankful to the helpful clinic assistants and nurses today, I fell down and had a bleeding wound. Although the clinic was full of patients, the nurse helped me first to dress my wound, and advised me to go to ED as my wound was too big to settle in clinic. The staff were friendly and efficient, there was no waiting, and it's wonderful that the CA/ Nurses were able to help out the Dr during the busy period to ensure patients get timely care.
Highly recommended. Front counter nurses all of them are very efficient, fast, approachable and friendly. Worth the visit with their great hospitality and cheerful personality.
The nurse on duty was really friendly. I have took the injection she gave me today at many places before but no one injected it as painless as she did. She is really good at her job.
